publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3027 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Today's Business-That the Parliament agrees that on Wednesday 24 April 2002- (a) the meeting of the Parliament shall continue to 7.00 pm as permitted under Rule 2.2.4; and (b) that Decision Time shall be held at 6.50 pm. Supported by: Euan Robson*
